feed.title: Pinchflat Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v0.1.12
entry.content:
[Bugfix] Force video to be overwritten so media redownloading works in all cases @kieraneglin

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v0.1.11...v0.1.12

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v0.1.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Enhancement] Allow overriding output templates on a per-source basis by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/179
  • [Housekeeping] Close system port when jobs are cancelled by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/182
  • [Enhancement] Improve support for 4k videos with Plex by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/181

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v0.1.12...v0.1.13

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v0.1.14
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Bugfix]: Fixed apprise notifications when fast indexing by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/187
  • [Enhancement] Improve embedded metadata date compatibility by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/188
  • [Bugfix]: Misc. bugfixes 2024-04-16 by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/189

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v0.1.13...v0.1.14

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v0.1.15
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Enhancement] Add pagination for a source's media by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/190
  • [Enhancement] Improve layout of media item page on large displays by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/192
  • [Bugfix] Ensure source metadata fetching uses windows-compatible filepaths by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/193
  • [Enhancement] Allow forcing a refresh of source metadata by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/194
  • [Housekeeping] Removed NFO backfill worker by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/199

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v0.1.14...v0.1.15

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v0.1.16
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Enhancement] Optionally add episode art to podcast feeds by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/201
  • [Housekeeping] Prevent unavailable videos from being immediately retried by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/210
  • [Bugfix] Stop Apprise notifications from being sent if the Source doesn't download media by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/218
  • [Enhancement] Custom media lifecycle scripts by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/219
  • [Enhancement] Add Media Center support for videos uploaded on the same day by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/221
  • [Enhancement] Add in-app indicator when a new release is published by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/222
  • [Enhancement] Add reload button to "live" tables by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/223

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v0.1.15...v0.1.16
